verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* learned \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w grain|strong="H7668"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w staring|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w another|strong="H7200"\w*?”

“\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* added, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w grain|strong="H7668"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w Go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w some|strong="H8033"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H4714"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3381"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w of|strong="H4714"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s brothers \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w grain|strong="H1250"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s brother \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* brothers, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am afraid \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w harm|strong="H7971"\w* \w might|strong="H6435"\w* \w befall|strong="H7122"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w grain|strong="H7666"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w also|strong="H3478"\w* spread \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ruler|strong="H7989"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sold|strong="H7666"\w* \w grain|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers arrived, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w faces|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ground.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* brothers, \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w recognized|strong="H5234"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H1696"\w* treated \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H1696"\w* strangers \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w harshly|strong="H7186"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*. “Where \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* come \w from|strong="H7200"\w*?” \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w asked|strong="H1696"\w*. “\w From|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3667"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*. “\w We|strong="H7186"\w* \w are|strong="H7186"\w* here \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* food.”

\w Although|strong="H3808"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w recognized|strong="H5234"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* brothers, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w recognize|strong="H5234"\w* \w him|strong="H5234"\w*.

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w* \w about|strong="H3130"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* said, “\w You|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H2472"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w*! \w You|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w come|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* land \w is|strong="H3130"\w* vulnerable.”

“\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H5650"\w* lord,” \w they|strong="H3808"\w* replied. “\w Your|strong="H3808"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* come \w to|strong="H5650"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* food.

\w We|strong="H5168"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*. \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* honest \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w*.”

“\w No|strong="H3808"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* told \w them|strong="H7200"\w*. “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* come \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* land \w is|strong="H3808"\w* vulnerable.”

\w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* answered, “\w Your|strong="H3117"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*. \w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H5650"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* no more.”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w declared|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Just|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H1696"\w* I \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w are|strong="H3130"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w*!

\w And|strong="H6547"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H6547"\w* \w be|strong="H2416"\w* tested: \w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H6547"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w leave|strong="H3318"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H2088"\w* \w unless|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* brother \w comes|strong="H3318"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w*.

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* number \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w get|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* brother; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* rest \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* confined \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w truth|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w may|strong="H2416"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* tested. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* untrue, \w then|strong="H3947"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w*!”
So Joseph imprisoned \w them|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* said \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* God. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*:

\w If|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H3651"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* honest, leave \w one|strong="H3651"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3651"\w* brothers \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w custody|strong="H4929"\w* \w while|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* rest \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H3651"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w take|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H3212"\w* \w grain|strong="H7668"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* relieve \w the|strong="H3651"\w* hunger \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3651"\w* \w households|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3651"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* brother \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* verified, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.” \w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* consented.

\w Then|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w another|strong="H7200"\w*, “\w Surely|strong="H8085"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H6869"\w* \w being|strong="H5315"\w* punished \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* brother. \w We|strong="H8085"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w anguish|strong="H6869"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w pleaded|strong="H2603"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*. \w That|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w* \w has|strong="H5315"\w* come \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w responded|strong="H6030"\w*, “Didn’t \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w boy|strong="H3206"\w*? \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*. \w Now|strong="H2009"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w must|strong="H1571"\w* \w account|strong="H6030"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*!”

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w realize|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w understood|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w was|strong="H3130"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w interpreter|strong="H3887"\w* \w between|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*. \w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w had|strong="H5869"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* bound \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3651"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w orders|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w bags|strong="H3627"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w grain|strong="H1250"\w*, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w each|strong="H5414"\w* man’s \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w sack|strong="H8242"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w provisions|strong="H6720"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*. \w This|strong="H3651"\w* \w order|strong="H6680"\w* \w was|strong="H3130"\w* \w carried|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w loaded|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w grain|strong="H7668"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*.

\w At|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w where|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w lodged|strong="H4411"\w* \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* night, \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w sack|strong="H8242"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* get \w feed|strong="H4554"\w* \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sack|strong="H8242"\w*.

“\w My|strong="H7725"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w been|strong="H2729"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*!” \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* brothers. “\w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* sack.” \w Their|strong="H7725"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w sank|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w trembling|strong="H2729"\w*, \w they|strong="H4100"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w another|strong="H1571"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w that|strong="H6213"\w* God \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*?”

\w When|strong="H3290"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* reached \w their|strong="H3605"\w* father \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w in|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w they|strong="H3605"\w* described \w to|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3290"\w* \w happened|strong="H7136"\w* \w to|strong="H5046"\w* \w them|strong="H5046"\w*:

“\w The|strong="H5414"\w* man who \w is|strong="H1696"\w* lord \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w harshly|strong="H7186"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1696"\w* accused \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1696"\w* spying \w on|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* country.
\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* told \w him|strong="H1961"\w*, ‘We \w are|strong="H1961"\w* honest men, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w*.
